headline: TruStage™ Names Stephanie Bush, Mandy Fields to Board of Directors
summary: New Board Members Bring Outstanding Leadership in Insurance, FinanceMADISON, Wis., Jan. 12, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- TruStage™, a financially strong insurance and financial services provider, announced today the appointment of Stephanie Bush and Mandy Fields to its Board of Directors. “Stephanie and Mandy bring outstanding leadership, innovative mindsets and, respectively, a deep expertise in the insurance industry and finance,” said Terrance Williams, president and CEO of TruStage. “Their stron
